content: this pattern is specific to the polarspun yarn - might also work well with bernat lulu or similar i will soon be adding a worsted yarn version if you want to know more about gumball the kitten and his crusade to take over the world try here 1 and here 2 1 http //secret-agent-josephine com/blog/2007/01/14/gumball-takes-over-the-world/ 2 http //flickr com/groups/gumball-takes-over/
